title: Stuffed Peppers
directions: Take the veins/seeds out and cut red peppers in half. Parboil them in salted water for 5 minutes.
Put the red peppers in a greased baking dish.

Beat 3 eggs before adding to ground beef. Add diced tomatoes, salt, and pepper to ground beef. Mix well. Divide this misture in half. You will add Instant Rice to half and then Cauliflower Rice to other half. Now you will put the beef in each red pepper half. Spoon the tomato sauce on each one.
Add shredded cheese on top of peppers with Cauliflower Rice.
Cover and bake at 350 degrees for 1 1/2 hours. Remove from oven.
ingredients: 3 red peppers, halved vertically for 6 halves
1/2 cup Instant Rice for half mixture
1 cup Cauliflower Rice for other half mixture
Shredded Cheese for peppers with Cauliflower Rice
